name: Doogy!
desc: A place where dog enthusiasts can be who they are and find thousands of dog pictures being fetched from a public API in which hosts one of the biggest collections of open source dog pictures.
mics: Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, jQuery & Javascript, AJAX, Python & Django.

name: Lost&Found
desc: Designed & Built an in-house lost and found web app for students & instructors at Coding Dojo.
mics: Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, AJAX, Python, Django.

name: Find Waldo
desc: An open-source project. Re-inventing the classic 'Find Waldo' game on the web.
mics: Technologies: HTML5, CSS3 & Animations, Bootstrap, jQuery & Javascript.

name: Kinh Thánh BD2011
mics: Technologies: Swift, UIKit, Grand Central Dispatch (GCD).
Deployment: App Store (through App Store Connect & Xcode).

name: The API Guy.
desc: A site for developers to scrape for all kind of APIs that exist out there, just through a simple search on The API Guy. site can show handful of results of matching APIs that you're looking for, or you can browse them by categories or execute some advanced searching.
mics: Technologies: Javascript, Node (NPM), React.js & React Hooks, Axios.
